author: Long Nguyen
title: MinSwap - Multi-pool DEX
description: Currently, there isn't any DEX on Cardano and new projects don't have a place to bootstrap their token distribution.
solution: Introducing MinSwap - a DEX on Cardano that supports multiple liquidity pool functions and initial token listing.
experience: The founder formerly worked as a software engineer at Amazon & Jenkins. Our team also has achieved Innovation Award at NEO Hackathon Tokyo.
